meta.article_title: December 4, 2017 - How to Mess Up Your Opponent When Forced to Make a Weak Shot

mess_up_opponent_weak_shot.probleme: Reach or lunge for a shot

debutant.description: Keep the ball deep to keep opponent farther away and cut off extreme angles; give yourself more time to react

intermediaire.description: Aim for a wide corner to force opponent to move and increase chances of mistake

avance.description: Aim for one extreme angle, then go the other way at the last second to mess up opponent
Put a good topspin or backspin on the ball even when lunging; can be tricky for some opponents
Fake backspin but meet the ball with little or no spin; can catch opponents off guard

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice keeping the ball deep to keep opponent farther away and cut off extreme angles; give yourself more time to react

erreurs_a_eviter.nom: Lifting the ball off the table
erreurs_a_eviter.description: Be careful not to lift the ball right off the table with too much spin
